summary: The war in Iraq is the backdrop as the Crosby, Stills, Nash, and Young "Freedom of Speech Tour" crisscrosses North America. Echoes of Vietnam-era anti-war sentiment abound as the band connects with today's audiences.
cast: David Crosby|Stephen Stills|Graham Nash|Neil Young|Mike Cerre|Bo Alexander|Josh Hisle|Michael Lemke|Karen Meredith|Darrell Anderson|Tammy Duckworth|Patrick Murphy|Stephen Colbert|Eric Von Haessler|Rick Rosas|Larry Wachs|George W. Bush
director: Directors: Neil Young (as Bernard Shakey), Benjamin Johnson
title: CSNY/Déjà Vu
